text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea pachyphylla (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Dark Red Meranti) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is a tree endemic to Borneo. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea pachyphylla". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33429A9783785. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33429A9783785.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
